title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr, Barmouth, Meirionnydd
title.cy: Casgliad o luniau o gangen Merched y Wawr y Bermo a’r Cylch, Meirionnydd.

description.en: Y gangen yn ymweld âg Abaty Cymer, Llanelltyd, Mehefin, 1999. Gwelwn: Eurwen Thomas, Eirlys Williams, Gwyneth Edwards, Elinor Jones, Enid Evams, Glenys Ffoulkes, Elisabeth, Lilian Edwards, Joy Thurman (canol) Angharad Roberts, Gretta Jones, Geinor Lavender, Elisabeth, Annie May, (blaen)Dorothy Williams, Margaret Owen, Grace Williams, Llewela Edwards, Megan Vaughan.
description.cy: Y gangen yn ymweld âg Abaty Cymer, Llanelltyd, Mehefin, 1999. Gwelwn: Eurwen Thomas, Eirlys Williams, Gwyneth Edwards, Elinor Jones, Enid Evams, Glenys Ffoulkes, Elisabeth, Lilian Edwards, Joy Thurman (canol) Angharad Roberts, Gretta Jones, Geinor Lavender, Elisabeth, Annie May, (blaen)Dorothy Williams, Margaret Owen, Grace Williams, Llewela Edwards, Megan Vaughan.
